title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: When creating a new file, we currently use the line delimiter returned from System.getProperties("line.delimiter"). However, this may not always align with the user's preference.
EB: The expected behavior is to provide a user interface in the preferences section allowing users to define the default line delimiters for new files.
SR:
1. Open the Eclipse IDE.
2. Navigate to the preferences section.
3. Look for a new option under 'File' or 'Text' preferences allowing the user to define default line delimiters.
4. Set the preferred line delimiters.
5. Create a new file and observe that the chosen default line delimiters are applied.
